/*==================================================
CampusView.js

The Views component is responsible for rendering web page with data provided by the corresponding Container component.
It constructs a React component to display a single campus and its students (if any).
================================================== */import{Link}from"react-router-dom";// Take in props data to construct the component
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CampusView=function CampusView(props){var campus=props.campus;// Render a single Campus view with list of its students
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:campus.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:campus.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:campus.description}),campus.students.map(function(student){var name=student.firstname+" "+student.lastname;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/student/".concat(student.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:name})})},student.id);})]});};export default CampusView;
